table.name: content
table.description: Website content table (one row per page)

table.name: secret
table.description: Website secret table (one row per page, registers data that either requires higher permission for access or is intended to use only from backend processes)

table.name: processing
table.description: Website processing table (one row per created or modified pages)

table.name: cache
table.description: Website cache table (one row per page)

table.name: branch
table.description: Website branch table (one row per branch)

table.name: revision
table.description: Website revision table (one row per revision)

table.name: files
table.description: Website files table (one row per file version)

table.name: journal
table.description: Journal table, which keeps track of page creations. If a page isn't created after a certain time, it is deleted by the snapbackend.
